The Clanner had a cunning smile. She seemed to be able to reason, and 
a machine would make a very good warrior.

Vlad: I may have a solution. I hereby offer my batchall (battle 
challenge). It is a Trial of Possession. Should you win, I will help 
you seek you identity. If I win, you become a warrior of Clan Wolf. Do 
you agree, quiaff?
